title.en: A Modern Man Who Transmigrated Into the Murim World

altTitles.en: Modern Man Falling Into the World of Murim
A Modern Man Who Got Transmigrated to Murim

altTitles.es-la: Un hombre moderno en el Murim

description.en: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. “…I’m Jo Hwi?” At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out one’s will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. There’s only one way out! “Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me.” The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title.en: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.ja: 与えられたスキルを使って稼いで異世界美女達とイチャイチャしたい

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menggunakan Keterampilan Yang Diberikan Untuk Mendapatkan Uang Dan Menggoda Wanita Cantik Dari Dunia Lain

altTitles.ja-ro: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.en: I Want to Use the Skills Given to Earn Money and Flirt With Beauties From Other Worlds

description.en: That day, Ichita Yamada was working part-time as usual. When he opened the back door after finishing his part-time job, he found a blank space and a person who called himself God. It was by chance that he was chosen by God to go to another world. He was perplexed, but decided to live anyway. Thinking about how to survive in this other world using the skills he received from God, he tries his best to have a physical relationship with a beautiful woman in this other world.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

description.en: Skylar has a secret hobby - taking photos of his crush, Chan-il. But when Cirrus stumbles upon Skylar's cloud storage with its impressive collection of Chan-il's photos, things escalate pretty quickly. At first confident his secret is safe with Cirrus, Skylar continuously finds himself in compromising situations, making him question Cirrus' true motives
description.uk:
У Ханиля є таємне хобі - фотографувати своє нерозділене кохання, Чаниля. Але коли Хьонун натикається на хмарне сховище Ханиля, з його вражаючою колекцією фотографій, ситуація досить швидко загострюється.
Чи збереже Хьонун секрет? Що він задумав?
description.pt-br: Skylar tem um hobby secreto - tirar fotos de sua paixão, Chan-il. Mas quando Cirrus se depara com o armazenamento de nuvem de Skylar com sua impressionante coleção de fotos de Chan-il, as coisas começam a andar muito rapidamente. A princípio confiante de que seu segredo está seguro com Cirrus, Skylar continuamente se encontra em situações comprometedoras, fazendo-o questionar os verdadeiros motivos de Cirrus.

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en: The year is 1294, and war rages. Lucas, the bugler of a small mercenary band, is endlessly thrown into battle after battle, but longs for the day that he can fulfill his wish of becoming a real musician. One fateful day, however, Lucas's latent powers awaken and his life takes a drastic turn. Under the guidance of the Pope, Lucas is tasked to become a key player in the war and lead the fight against the Empire and its agent of destruction, the Garland. Burdened by this dangerous mission, Lucas still longs for the day that he may see his wish come true…

altTitles.ja: オレンジ

description.en: The spring she turns sixteen, Takamiya Naho receives a strange, but detailed letter from herself, ten years in the future. At first she thinks the letter is a prank, but then the things written in the letter actually happen, including the arrival of the new transfer student who sits next to her in class, Naruse Kakeru. The letter reads just like her diary entries, down to the same characters. It is not until two weeks later, when Kakeru shows back up at school, that Naho finishes the letter. In the letter, her twenty-seven year old self tells her sixteen-year old self that her biggest regret is that Kakeru is no longer with them in the future, and asks her to watch him closely.

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

title.en: I Want to Play with Onii-chan.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんと遊びたい
メスガキ

altTitles.ja: 無口な先生に全力告白したら まんざらでもなかった件

altTitles.ja-ro: Mukuchina Sensei ni Zenryoku Kokuhaku Shitara Manzarade mo Nakatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 生意気な後輩
The Doomsday is Wartime
列強戦線

description.en: The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!

title.en: Kirby of the Stars: Daily Round Diary!

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoshi no Kirby - Kyou mo Manmaru Nikki!

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ 今日もまんまる日記！

description.en: He's pink and round! He's a glutton! A new manga series about Kirby, the airheaded but irresistible hero of the video game world! Lots of copy abilities are here! Plus, the familiar members such as King Dedede, Waddle Dee, and Meta Knight, as well as such and such characters from previous Kirby titles, are all gathered together! The definitive version of the hilarious Kirby manga!

altTitles.ja: 恋の奇跡

description.en: Chubby and plain, Taeko's biggest worry is whether she'll ever have the courage to tell her crush how she feels. Then one day a mysterious cousin comes to stay and Taeko's world is shattered. Cast out of her own home after her mother's death, Taeko stumbles into the night and is hit by a truck. When she wakes up, she's greeted by a doctor who promises to turn her life around. And thus begins a tale of revenge and intrigue that's a roller coaster of cracked out soap opera fun from start to finish.

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: フルメタル・パニック!

description.en: Trouble always seems to follow the beautiful and sassy, Kaname Chidori. Though she is only a high-school student, Kaname is constantly the target of terrorism. Lucky for her though, the dreamy Sosuke, an undercover agent from Mithril, is one step behind her, ready to protect her at any cost. But will he be able to save her from harm every time she is in trouble?
description.es-la: Los problemas siempre parecen perseguir a la bella y atrevida Kaname Chidori. Aunque solo es una estudiante de preparatoria, Kaname es constantemente el blanco del terrorismo. Sin embargo, por suerte para ella, el soñador Sosuke, un agente encubierto de Mithril, está un paso detrás de ella, listo para protegerla a cualquier costo. Pero, ¿podrá salvarla del daño cada vez que esté en problemas?

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: DEAD Tube ~デッドチューブ~

altTitles.zh: 学園殺人ゲーム Dead Tube

description.en: Distributing thrilling videos in secret! A school game that puts life and death on the line!
description.kk: Мектеп оқушылары киноклубта не түсіреді? Күнделікті өмірдің бөлшектері, әуесқой қорқынышты фильмдер... бұның бәрі зеріктіріп жібереді... бірақ бұл жолы емес! Басты кейіпкер Томохиро Мачиге, киноклуб операторы, мектептегі қыз бірнеше күнге оны түсіруді ұсынады. Ол ерекше ынталы емес болсада, бірақ ол да бас тартпайды. Егер жігіт бұл оның өміріндегі ең қызықты және қорқынышты фильм болатынын білгенде...
description.ru: Что могут снимать школьники в клубе любителей кино? Зарисовки из повседневности, любительские фильмы ужасов… скука полная… но только не в этот раз! Главному герою Томохиро Мачии, оператору киноклуба, одна девушка из школы предлагает поснимать её несколько дней. Он особо не горит желанием, но и не отказывается. Если бы парень только знал, что это будет самый захватывающий и будоражащий фильм в его жизни…

altTitles.ja: シーイズビューティフル

description.en: In the mysterious institution of Familie, girls are raised in isolation. Kurumi, a resident child, falls asleep the day before her 10th birthday. When she next awakes, 14 years have passed. The curtain opens on this tale of misfortune, following Kurumi's journey in an unfamiliar place, surrounded by friends who have long since grown up, and ridden with missing memories.
description.es-la: En una institución misteriosa, Familie, crían chicas. Allí vivía Kurumi, el día anterior a su 10º cumpleaños, se fue a dormir. Y al despertar pasaron 14 años. Está en un lugar desconocido, sus amigas crecieron. Aquí comienza el viaje bizarro para descubrir sus memorias perdidas

title.en: Shane x Onna Oujoushu no Manga

altTitles.ja: シェーン×女農場主の漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Shane x Onna Oujoushu no Manga

altTitles.en: A Manga about Shane and the Farmer

description.en:
A Stardew Valley doujin that follows the love story of Shane and Mugi, a farmer who has just moved to Pelican Town. 
The story is semi-original and does not strictly follow the game's events and dialogue.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! Official Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan wa Oshimai! Koushiki Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい！ 公式アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ru: Мой братик теперь не братик! Официальная комикс-антология!

An anthology comic of Onii-chan wa Oshimai! by various mangaka.

altTitles.en: The Garnet that Sparkles in Junk

altTitles.ja: ゴミ溜めのガーネット

description.en:
Kanae, a hitman, encounters a half vampire named Sara at a dump site and is attacked. With nothing to lose, Kanae is completely indifferent to having his blood sucked or his home invaded.

Sara, a bloodthirsty defective vampire abandoned by his parents, offers Kanae a deal: “In return for taking care of your decrepit lifestyle, become my food...”

What begins as a physical relationship fueled by the arousal of bloodsucking, brings a warmth they’ve never known, melting away the loneliness they’ve both carried — A love story where two lost souls find each other amidst a cruel and unforgiving world.

title.en: Mahou to Boku to Dekkai Shishou

altTitles.ja: 魔法と僕とでっかい師匠

altTitles.zh: 魔法与我与伟大的师父

altTitles.en: Magic, Me, and My Big Master!

description.en:
Hinata, who longs to be a wizard, heads to the mansion of a "Cursed Eye Witch" who can control people's hearts at will. What appeared there was Esmeralda, a terrifying witch with a huge body that made you look up at her. However, her true identity is a shy witch who loves Hinata so much that she can't help it!!
A romantic comedy between master and student that will make your heart flutter due to the height difference and the gap between the witch and her disciple.
description.ja: 身長差100cmのでっかい師匠が可愛すぎる！ 魔法使いに憧れる少年ヒナタが弟子入りしたのは、身長240cmの魔女エスメラルダ。魔法の指導のはずが、ヒナタのことが好きすぎる魔女の指導はどんどんエスカレート。 これって師弟愛！？ それとも異性愛！？

altTitles.th: บุปผารุ่มราคะ

description.en: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.
description.pl:
Mój mąż miał romans.
Nie wystarczy wziąć na siebie mnóstwo długów, stracić dziecko, na moich oczach zmieszałam się z bardzo młodą kobietą. Zranione życie usychało bez żadnego wyglądu.
"Pokarz mi miłość dorosłego" - podejrzany młodszy mężczyzna, który wtargnął w życie Na Haesoo.
Niebezpieczny i posłuszny, zaczyna potrząsać Na Haesoo.
description.pt-br: A vida de Na Hae-soo se desfaz quando seu marido a trai. Como se não bastasse estar endividada e ter perdido um filho… Em um golpe devastador, ela o flagra fazendo sexo com uma mulher bem mais jovem do que ela. Quebrada e desanimada, Na Hae-soo sente sua vida desmoronando ao seu redor.  No entanto, um jovem misterioso inesperadamente entra em sua vida, pedindo para ser ensinado sobre o amor adulto. Sua vulnerabilidade e sinceridade começam a despertar emoções em Na Hae-soo, desafiando-a a reconsiderar seu caminho a seguir.

altTitles.ja: 怪しいおまわりさん

description.en: A "police box" drama that peeks into the daily life of police officers...

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

altTitles.ja: 悪祓士のキヨシくん

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

altTitles.ja: 時先生は着替えたい

altTitles.en: Ms. Toki Wants to Change Clothes
Ms. Toki wants to change clothes.

description.en:
Meet Shisoya Toki, a quiet female teacher with a thing for “clothes”. Often seen as cold and unfriendly, her students call her the “unfortunate beautiful teacher”. 

But one day, while organizing supplies in the old school building, she finds a brand new pair of bloomers. Suddenly, her kinky curiosity about “clothes” goes wild!! 

Sometimes SEXY! Sometimes CUTE! Get ready for a wild ride full of seductive cosplay!!
description.ja: “服“が趣味の寡黙な女教師・四十八時（しそやとき）。冷たい・不愛想と思われがちな彼女は、生徒から「残念美人教師」と呼ばれてしまう…。しかしある日の放課後、備品整理のため向かった旧校舎で、新品のブルマーを発見した時先生は、“服”への痴的好奇心が爆発し…！！時にSEXY！時にKAWAII！魅惑満載コスプレ・エロス！！
description.es-la: Conoce a Shisoya Toki, una profesora tranquila a la que le gusta la "ropa". A menudo vista como fría y antipática, sus alumnos la llaman la "desafortunada y hermosa maestra". Pero un día, mientras organiza los suministros en el antiguo edificio de la escuela, encuentra un nuevo par de bloomers. ¡De repente, su curiosidad pervertida por la "ropa" se vuelve loca! A veces SEXY, a veces LINDO.¡prepárate para un viaje salvaje lleno de cosplay seductor!

altTitles.ja: この世界は不完全すぎる

description.en: Haga is one of the debuggers that gets stuck in the world of an incomplete VR game. Though he eradicates a monster from a village, the destruction event that ends with the villagers' deaths triggers without fail. However, Nicola, the villager girl he saves, revives before his eyes.
description.ja: 極秘に組織された調査隊「王の探索者」（キングス・シーカー）の一員である主人公・ハガ。この世のあらゆる事象を調べ、王命を受け旅をする探索者は村人からも尊敬されていた。任務の一環でドラゴンの襲撃から村を守ることに成功するハガ。成り行きで助けた少女・ニコラと世界を探検することになるが、ハガの真の目的は冒険ではなく…。
description.pt-br: O protagonista Haga é um membro da equipe de investigação secreta chamada "Os Buscadores do Rei" (Kings Seekers). Os exploradores, que investigam todos os fenômenos deste mundo e viajam sob ordens do rei, são respeitados pelos habitantes das aldeias. Haga consegue proteger uma vila do ataque de um dragão como parte de uma missão. Por acaso, ele acaba ajudando uma garota chamada Nicola e começa a explorar o mundo com ela. No entanto, o verdadeiro objetivo de Haga não é a aventura…

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: Ashita mo Mata Yuusha no Tonari

altTitles.ja: 明日もまた勇者のとなり

altTitles.en: Tomorrow Will Be Another Day Next to the Hero

description.en:
Mao Kurose can't stop thinking about Kanade Momomiya, the classmate sitting next to her. Unable to sort out her feelings, Kurose discovered memories of her past life as the Demon Lord, and recalled the moment that the Demon Lord killed the Hero. The Hero with the exact same face as Momomiya.

Here comes a girls-love story that transcends time!

altTitles.en: He Wasn't Paying Attention in Health Class

description.en:
Onodera Kokoro of School Back fame drops a bomb!

First year high schooler Haruka gets asked out. He helped her when she was getting bullied, one thing led to another, and now they're dating...

title.en: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.ja: ダメドルと世界に1人だけのファン

altTitles.ja-ro: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.en: The Useless Idol and Her Only Fan in the World
A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

altTitles.id: Idol Gak Guna dan Penggemar Satu-satunya di Dunia

altTitles.es-la: Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Idol Inútil E Seu Único Fã No Mundo

altTitles.en: Damedol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed――. A parasite psycho-thriller by Edogawa Edogawa of "Ikenie Touhyou".

title.en: The Villainess Is Adored by the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Kingdom

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou wa Ringoku no Oitaishi ni Dekiai Sareru
Akuyaku Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiaisareru

altTitles.en: The Villainess Is Being Doted on by the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Country

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢は隣国の王太子に溺愛される

description.en:
Tiararose was supposed to be disengaged and exiled from the country.

“This was the Otome game I had played!” She realized on the day before the story’s ending――…….

Shall I wait for the judgment? But, I did not do anything too cruel……. Thinking so, the ending continues.

But, during the judgement――something that was not possible in the game happened. The neighboring crown prince courted the villainous daughter Tiararose.
description.pt-br: A história é sobre uma garota que acaba indo parar no mundo do seu jogo otome favorito reencarnando como a vilã Tiararose, filha de um duque do reino de Lapis Lazuli. Desde criança ela foi criada para herdar o trono como noiva do Príncipe Hartknights. Originalmente, no fim do jogo, Tiararose vê seu noivado ser anulado e é expulsa do reino por supostamente importunar Akari, a heroína do jogo e estudante que se transferiu para a escola local e passou a ficar cada vez mais próxima de Hartknights. Mas aí algo que não estava no jogo acontece: durante o julgamento que decidiria sua expulsão, o Príncipe Aquasteed, do reino de Marineforest, decide intervir e passa a cortejar Tiararose. Será que o destino da vilã será diferente?

altTitles.es-la: Convertí a my amigo de la infancia (♂) en una chica

altTitles.id: Gue Ubah Teman Masa Kecil (♂) Gue Jadi Cewek

altTitles.en: I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend (♂) Into a Girl
How to Make a "Girl" Fall in Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi (♂) wo Onnanoko ni Shiteshimatta Hanashi

altTitles.pt-br: Transformei meu amigo de infância (♂) em uma garota

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染（♂）を女の子にしてしまった話
恋する（おとめ）の作り方

altTitles.en: I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend Into a Girl

altTitles.th: เมคอัปรักเสกนายให้สวยปิ๊ง

description.en: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!
description.id: Seorang siswa SMA yang populer diam-diam suka dunia kosmetik, dan meminta teman masa kecilnya yang dekil untuk latihan dandan… tapi, teman masa kecilnya malah jadi imut!?
description.es-la: Un muchacho popular que en secreto está interesado en cosméticos le pide a su amigo simplón dejarlo maquillarle para practicar… ¿¡Y termina viéndose bello(a)!?
description.pt-br: Um garoto popular que está secretamente interessado em cosméticos pede para praticar maquiagem em seu amigo de infância … e ele acaba ficando uma Linda Garota ?!

altTitles.en: Even 'Used Goods' Wants to Experience Love!
Even If It Is Second Hand, I Want to Fall in Love!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu não preciso de uma heroína real

altTitles.ru: Даже использованный товар желает испытать любовь

altTitles.th: มือสองแล้วทําไมถ้าใจคิดจะรัก

altTitles.ja: 現実の彼女はいりません!

description.en: Aramiya Seiichi is an ordinary high school eroge otaku who's given up all hope on girls in the 3D world due to a certain incident. One day, after he's bought a bunch of new material in consequence of experiencing the frustration of a perfect eroge character turning out to be used goods, he encounters a delinquent-like-looking girl being about to get raped by a bunch of guys. By mere chance, he rescues her. Days later, when school starts again, it turns out to have been his classmate, Ayame, a feared delinquent girl who's got all kind of rumors about her, especially that she's used goods. And it appears that she's set on becoming his ideal girl to make him fall for her.
description.ja: 三次元に興味ナシのオタクな高校生・新宮清一は、ひょんなことから学校一の不良少女・綾女古都子に告白される。当然の如くこれを断固拒否！　……した清一だったが、古都子は「じゃあ、お前の理想になってやるよ！」とメインヒロインのようなツインテ美少女に変貌して、強引なアプローチで迫り始め…？
description.pt: Aramiya Seiichi é um estudante ordinário… Um otaku dos eroges que perdeu todas as esperanças nas garotas em 3D devido um certo incidente. Um dia, após ele comprar alguns materiais novos devido uma frustração em consequência de uma experiência frustrante com uma "personagem perfeita" de um eroge, ele encontra uma garota delinquente prestes a ser estuprada por um grupo de homens. Por um acaso ele acaba salvando ela, e por este acaso a sua vida acaba mudando completamente...
description.ru: Когда Сейчи учился в младших классах, он получил психическую травму из-за некой девушки. С тех самых пор, он с недоверием относится к девушкам, и испытывает отвращение к не девственницам. Сейчас Сейчи эроге-отаку, ученик старшей школы, однажды вечером он оказывается свидетелем попытки изнасилования девушки группой людей, случайно привлекая внимания насильников, он использует смекалку и успешно спасает себя и девушку. Девушка оказывается известной хулиганкой, и о ней часто ходят не очень хорошие слухи, а что не менее важно, девушка эта – одноклассница Сейчи, Аямэ. После того дня, она влюбляется в главного героя, и решает добиться его расположения любым способом. Видя потуги девушки, учительница Сейчи просит его помочь Аямэ стать нормальной девушкой, на что тот неохотно соглашается. Так и начинается история о парне, который пытается исправить хулиганку, попутно устраняя все нажитые ею слухи, и о девушке, которая хочет любви.

title.en: A High School With Only Men
Saenai Riman to Yankee Joshi Kousei

altTitles.en: Dull Businessman and Naughty High School Girl

altTitles.ja: 冴えないリーマンとヤンキー女子高生

description.en: Yamada Hiroyuki is 26 years old, has a stable job, is an otaku, but is overwhelmed by the ideas and thoughts of his family, i.e. marriage and criticism over his childish hobbies. He decides to leave the house and go to live in an apartment, alone and happy, but the perfect image he had in mind when he moved in was destroyed when he learned that his neighbor is a yankee schoolgirl. However he soon discovers her real personalty is quite awkward and very tender. Will the story of these two advance for the better?
description.pt-br: Yamada Hiroyuki tem 26 anos, tem um emprego estável, é um otaku, oprimido pelas ideias e pensamentos de sua família (quando você se casa? Você ainda assiste animes na sua idade?) Ele decide sair de casa e ir morar em um apartamento, sozinho e feliz, mas a imagem perfeita que ele tinha em mente quando se mudou, foi destruída quando soube que sua vizinha é uma yankee (delinquente) e ao mesmo tempo uma colegial, logo ele descobre que aquela garota rude e desbocada é alguém desajeitada, muito terna e muito fofa. A história desses dois jovens avançará para melhor?

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

altTitles.ja: 未だ亡くなっていない人

altTitles.en: Wives Who have not Yet Passed Away

description.en: Haruka Kawarazaki, a young man aspiring to be a manga artist, and Mayuko Kawarazaki, a beautiful woman to whom everyone looks back. They live in a room in a flat, share a meal every night and lay on each other's skin. But they are not husband and wife. A woman whose heart has been broken and a young man who knows it but continues their relationship.
description.ja:
兄は逝き、義姉は壊れ、僕は溺れた

漫画家を目指す青年･河原崎遥と、誰もが振り返る美女･河原崎繭子。共に暮らし、毎夜、食事を共にし、肌を重ねる。しかし、二人は夫婦ではない。繭子は、遥の義姉。死んだ兄の妻なのだ。心が壊れてしまった女と、それを知りながら関係を続ける男―――
description.vi: Chuyện xoay quanh anh chàng Kawarazaki Haruka có ước mơ được trở thành một tác giả truyện tranh và Kawarazaki Mayuko, một người phụ nữ xinh đẹp khiến cho bất kỳ người đàn ông nào cũng đều không khỏi phải ngước nhìn. Hai người họ hiện đang cùng chung sống trong một căn hộ, nấu ăn cho nhau và thậm chí còn làm cả những chuyện chăn gối dù rằng cả hai thực ra không phải vợ chồng. Một mối quan hệ cấm kỵ giữa người phụ nữ đã tan nát cõi lòng và chàng thanh niên dù biết tất cả nhưng vẫn quyết định nhắm mắt làm ngơ mà tiếp tục duy trì mối quan hệ hiện tại.
description.es-la: Haruka Kawarazaki, un joven que aspira a ser Mangaka, y Mayuko Kawarazaki, una hermosa mujer a la que todos miran. Viven en una misma habitación, comparten una comida cada noche y se acuestan sobre la piel del otro. Pero no son marido y mujer. Una mujer con el corazón roto y un joven que lo sabe pero que continúa su relación: un thriller de amor sobre una relación prohibida que no puedes detener aunque sepas que está mal.
description.pt-br: A história segue o jovem aspirante a mangaká, **Haruka Kawarazaki**, e a deslumbrante, **Mayuko Kawarazaki**, que atrai a atenção de todos. Os dois vivem juntos em um apartamento, compartilham refeições todas as noites e satisfazem todos seus desejos carnais sobre a cama. No entanto, eles não são um casal. Uma mulher cujo coração foi partido e um jovem que sabe disso, mas que continua a sua relação. *― Um suspense romântico que retrata um relacionamento proibido que não pode ser interrompido, mesmo sabendo que é errado.*

description.en:
A world of constant war because we don't understand each other's differences.
A world where it is normal to hate and harm other species.
In this hellish world where blood is splashed and people kill and kill each other, how can a boy named Rito survive?
A medieval dark fantasy of humans and xenomorphs.

altTitles.en: I Accidentally Seduced the Male Lead's Younger Brother

description.en:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.”

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later–

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---

description.es:
“No, no quiero.”

La propuesta fue rechazada como un golpe en seco.

“Confucio no es de mi agrado. Mi preferencia es el hermano menor de Confucio”.

“¿Qué? ¿A mi hermana le gusta?”

“Así es. No tú, sino tu hermano.”

===

Ese ‘hermano menor’ vino a nosotros como una bestia con una belleza trascendental. 

“Nunca te he olvidado ni por un solo momento. Por favor, cásate conmigo, hermana.”

---

description.id:
Dia memiliki kekasih dari pemeran utama pria dalam novel R19. Dalam novel aslinya, pemeran utama pria adalah sampah yang mencampakkannya setelah membuatnya hamil, mengatakan bahwa dia terlambat menyadari bahwa dia mencintai pahlawan wanita tersebut. Untungnya, itu masih sebelum pekerjaan aslinya dimulai. Saya memutuskan untuk menghapus omong kosong ini sendiri. *** "Tidak, aku tidak mau". Aku dengan tegas menolak tawaran Killian untuk berselingkuh dengannya. Ketika dia bertanya mengapa, saya tersenyum cerah dan menjawab. “Tuan Muda tidak sesuai dengan seleraku. Jika saya harus mengatakan, adik laki-laki Anda jauh lebih disukai. ” "Itu? Apakah kamu lebih suka adik laki-lakiku?" "Ya. Bukan kamu, tapi kakakmu." *** Berbeda dengan aslinya, saya dengan kuat membangun tembok besi, merawat Lexion, adik laki-laki yang dilecehkan oleh kakak laki-lakinya, dan melindungi pemeran utama wanita asli yang memiliki harga rendah terhadap pemeran utama pria yang tidak bermutu itu. Dan sekarang setelah saya melakukan apa yang harus saya lakukan, saya akan pergi. Namun beberapa tahun kemudian, Lexion, yang melewati kakak laki-lakinya dan duduk di kursi sang duke, kembali kepadaku seperti binatang buas dengan kecantikan dekaden. Selain itu, dia bahkan memegang dokumen jaminan yang saya tandatangani sebagai lelucon saat masih kecil. “Aku tidak pernah melupakanmu sedetik pun. Tolong menikahlah denganku, noona.” Tidak, bukankah itu hanya untuk bermain rumah? Setiap kali saya menolak lamaran pernikahannya, dia dengan lembut memeluk pinggang saya dan bertanya kepada saya dengan suara yang begitu dingin. "Apakah seleramu berubah saat aku pergi?" Mata Lexion penuh dengan kehidupan saat dia bertanya. Ini seperti ketika dia mengetahui siapa tipeku, dia akan langsung membunuhnya.

---

description.ru:
Обычный офисный работник перевоплотился в романе 18+ в второстепенного персонажа, который изначально был любовницей главного героя. В оригинальном романе главный герой бросил ее после того, как она забеременела, сказав, что запоздало понял, что любит главную героиню. Теперь у нее есть шанс изменить судьбу этого персонажа и отказать главному герою: «Я на это не соглашусь!»

description.vi:
Tôi đã sở hữu cơ thể người yêu của nam chính trong một cuốn tiểu thuyết 19+. Trong nguyên tác, nam chính đích thị là một tên rác rưởi. Anh ta đã vứt bỏ cô sau khi làm cô có thai, còn bonus thêm câu anh ta đã vô tình rơi vào lưới tình của nữ chính. May thay, hiện giờ nguyên tác chưa bắt đầu. Vậy nên, tôi đã quyết định tự mình loại bỏ tên rác rưởi đó. *** “Không thích” Tôi đã nhanh chóng từ chối lời đề nghị làm người yêu từ Killian. Anh ta muốn hỏi tôi lý do với khuôn mặt đầy dấu chấm hỏi, tôi chỉ nhẹ nhàng nở nụ cười rạng rở và trả lời. “Thiếu gia đây không phải gu tôi. Gu tôi chính là em trai của thiếu gia cơ” “Gì? Em thích em trai của ta?” Chính xác rồi đó anh trai. Không phải anh, mà là em trai của anh cơ. *** Không như nguyên tác, tôi đã xây dựng một bức tường thành chắc chắn nhằm ngăn chặn tên thiếu gia kia. Bắt đầu chăm sóc cho Lexion, người bị anh trai của mình ngược đãi và cũng chính là người đã bảo vệ nữ chính. Và khi đã hoàn thành công việc, tôi đã nhanh chóng tẩu thoát khỏi dinh thự công tước. Nhưng trôi qua mấy năm. Lexion, người đã đẩy cái tên khốn kia ra khỏi vị trí công tước và tự mình ngồi chễm chệ trên vị trí đó đã trở thành một con thú và đến tìm tôi. Đồng thời còn mang theo một tờ giấy đính hôn có sẵn chữ ký như trò đùa khi nhỏ. “Em chưa hề quên chị dù chỉ một phút. Chị kết hôn với em nhé” Điều đó chẳng phải chỉ để con nít chơi với nhau à? Mỗi lần từ chối, anh ta lại bắt đầu quấn lấy eo của tôi mà ôm. Quá mệt mỏi, tôi đã hỏi anh ta với vẻ mặt nghiêm túc. “Chẳng lẽ em đã thay đổi gu trong thời gian chị vắng mặt?” Đôi mắt của Lexion chứa đầy sát khí khi tôi cất lời. Cứ như thể khi anh ta phát hiện ra gu của tôi là ai, anh ta sẽ giết người đó ngay lập tức.

---

description.zh:
“公爵不是我喜欢的类型，我喜欢的是公爵您的弟弟。” 果断拒绝油腻海王公爵的的提议，这一世我不会做你的情人，没想到随便使用的借口，却让对方上了心。那个小软萌弟弟长大后居然变成了一个病娇美男？“姐姐不是说喜欢我吗？”这个婚约该怎么拒绝呀！

description.pt-br:
**“Jovem mestre, você não faz o meu tipo… Eu quero o seu irmão!”**

“Você não faz o meu tipo, jovem mestre. Prefiro muito mais o seu irmão mais novo.”
“O quê? O meu irmão?”
“Isso mesmo, o seu irmão, não você.”

===
 Quando criança, eu assinei um contrato de casamento com este “irmão mais novo”, eu só não contava que…
“Eu nunca me esqueci de você, por favor, case-se comigo!”
Ele disse isso enquanto segurava o contrato que foi assinado quando éramos crianças, mas espera… não era tudo apenas uma brincadeira??!

---
"Não." Rejeitei categoricamente a oferta do canalha de ter um caso comigo. “O jovem mestre não é meu tipo. Meu tipo é seu irmão.” "O quê? Meu irmão é o seu tipo?" Garfos. Não você, mas seu irmão. * * * O 'irmão' veio até mim, uma fera da decadência. “Nunca me esqueci de você nem por um momento, quero que se case comigo, irmã.” Segurando os papéis de noivado que assinei de brincadeira na minha infância. Não, isso não era para uma brincadeira de criança? "Você mudou seus gostos enquanto eu estava fora?" Os olhos de Lexion estavam cheios de emoção quando ele perguntou. É como se ele soubesse do meu novo gosto, ele me mataria imediatamente.

---

description.en: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.ja: 暗黒デルタ

description.en:
In the otherworldly city of Delta, its grotesque residents sustain themselves by consuming human energy...!

This gritty, action-packed tale marks the first full series from the up-and-coming talent who captivated audiences with the one-shots “Death Salmon Hunter” and “Composter Funeral”!
description.ja: 人間たちの知らない、もうひとつの世界に存在する都市・デルタ。異形の者たちが住まうその都市では人間から吸い出したエネルギーが生活の全てを支え、最も価値のある物とされていた。住人のオーロラもエネルギーを集めて暮らしていたが、自分たちとは異なる価値観を持つ人間世界に興味津々！
